instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, then drain.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the garlic and chicken for 6-7 minutes, add the ratatouille and cook gently for 2-3 minutes until the chicken is cooked throughout.
Stir the pasta through the sauce coating it throughly, then add the parsley and season to taste.
